title: Verify: Implement Execution Engine Upgrades
description:
Run automated tests for task T-024.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Refactor orchestrator to support parallel execution, fan-in/fan-out, conditional and loop nodes, error handling (retries, timeouts, fallback), and full execution history.
Criteria:
- Parallel and conditional execution supported
- Loop and merge nodes work as specified
- Per-node error handling and fallback implemented
- Execution history with trace and diff view
acceptance_criteria: Loop and merge nodes work as specified
Per-node error handling and fallback implemented
Execution history with trace and diff view
